=== Firmware Test Suite - hotkey test ===

This interactive test waits for hotkey presses and attempts to look up the key code in the 
keymap file. The test can be exited by pressing the <ESC> escape keys.

==== Examples: ====

<pre>
fwts hotkey - 
</pre>

..runs the test on your machine and dumps the output to stdout. This test requires user interaction.
